remarks: The Cartesian product of two elements of a transitive Tarski class is an element of the class.  JFM CLASSES2 th. 67 (partly).  (Contributed by FL, 15-Apr-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2014.)
statement: tskxp $p |- ( ( ( T e. Tarski /\ Tr T ) /\ A e. T /\ B e. T ) -> ( A X. B ) e. T ) $.
